body: I'm stupid, even though it's useless to do this
Whatever group scanned this has a copy and could've easily uploaded the normal thing and yet, they decide to do this shit. Only Satan would tease me this hard.

Is there any content moderation on this site? This shit is either a joke or the most horrible advertisment for a scan group ever. Neither should be allowed. If there isn't a rule that forbids it, one should be made.
I've been waiting for this to arrive for so long........ I'll wait for a better quality though
